Chinese automakers open factories abroad as export clout causes frictionChinese automakers seeking global growth are building more car factories in overseas markets, as foreign regulators mull imposing measures against imports of China-made electric cars. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 10:47:55 GMT N6B5PQNUPRO4BDZDFIUXDVCQME https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/chinese-automakers-open-factories-abroad-export-clout-causes-friction-2024-03-14/Reuters商业汽车与交通
China's plan to cut downpayments for cars likely to fall flat, analysts sayChina's efforts to boost auto sales by cutting downpayments on car loans stand to be frustrated by a price war and consumer caution, chiefly benefiting a few brands favoured by younger buyers, such as Tesla and Nio , analysts said. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 10:35:01 GMT 5HKIOKC3XNOM3JLRLKTHWMQEPA https://www.reuters.com/business/auto-transportation/china-plan-cut-down payments-cars-likely-fall-flat-analysts-say-2024-03-14/Qiaoyi Li, Ziyi Tang, Brenda Goh商业汽车与交通
Exclusive: Trump launched CIA covert influence operation against ChinaTwo years into office, President Donald Trump authorized the Central Intelligence Agency to launch a clandestine campaign on Chinese social media aimed at turning public opinion in China against its government, according to former U.S. officials with direct knowledge of the highly classified operation. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 10:07:05 GMT JK46K2FQTZJEXCVVG5O43CU7ME https://www.reuters.com/world/us/trump-launched-cia-covert-influence-operation-against-china-2024-03-14/Joel Schectman, Christopher Bing世界美国
Morning Bid: Oil smudges inflation view, Tesla in slow laneA look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan Thu, 14 Mar 2024 10:02:35 GMT 2FKRBKAA7NPYRLGSHDG7FKEKNU https://www.reuters.com/markets/us/global-markets-view-usa-2024-03-14/Reuters市场美国市场
Media harassment after China restaurant blast sparks protest, public criticismThe association overseeing Chinese journalists issued a rare statement of protest after reporters were blocked by local residents and security guards while trying to report on the aftermath of a blast outside Beijing. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 09:51:49 GMT L2I4MSMEGNPNDF4IY6EM4MXIYY https://www.reuters.com/world/china/media-harassment-after-chinese-restaurant-blast-spark-protest-public-criticism-2024-03-14/Reuters世界中国
Italy regulator fines TikTok $11 million over content checksItaly's competition watchdog has fined three units of social media giant TikTok 10 million euros ($10.94 million) in total for inadequate checks on content potentially harmful to young or vulnerable users, it said on Thursday. Thu, 14 Mar 2024 09:33:20 GMT Z7KQFUWF3VO2JNUBN6I7Z6UQ7U https://www.reuters.com/technology/italian-regulator-fines-tiktok-11-mln-over-inadequate-checks-harmful-content-2024-03-14/Reuters技术
